Comments_List: The course was a fantastic way of getting to grips with the complexity of SOGI rights issues on a global level. Thematically organised in a coherent way, the course was an insightful way of framing issues that were both personal to many in the class in an academic and nuanced way.

Strengths: course packet, reading responses, presentations. 

How could it be improved; course packet could include some brief questions for guidance
